CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PersonBirthdate)), LPAD(TEXT(DAY(PersonBirthdate)), 2, '0') & '-' & LPAD(TEXT(MONTH(PersonBirthdate)), 2, '0') & '-' & TEXT(YEAR(PersonBirthdate)) & ' ( ' & IF( DATE(2000, MONTH(PersonBirthdate), DAY(PersonBirthdate)) <= DATE(2000, MONTH(TODAY()), DAY(TODAY())), TEXT(YEAR(Today()) - YEAR (PersonBirthdate)), TEXT(YEAR(Today()) - YEAR (PersonBirthdate) -1 )) & ' AÃ±os )' ,'')
CustomField.label: Fecha de nacimiento
